title: Online Project-Based Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic online learning tool utilization
context.additional_context: LMS-SNS Hybrid Platform for Team Projects: Focus on Collaborative Learning & Soft Skill Development

learning_goals: Learners can create a team project proposal within three days using online collaboration tools.
Learners achieve an 80% or higher feedback participation rate through peer assessment during the project process.
Learners can present creative solutions for solving social issues in the final presentation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
